function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spread of the SARS-CoV-2 virus globally","Impact":"High rates of infection and potential overload of healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Strict implementation of preventive measures like social distancing and quarantine","Technologies":"Digital contact tracing apps and monitoring systems","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, vulnerable individuals","Owner":"Government health agencies, international organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of treatment or vaccine for SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Continued spread of the virus and high mortality rates","Mitigation":"Accelerated research and development of treatments and vaccines","Technologies":"Advanced medical research technologies and clinical trials","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, vulnerable individuals","Owner":"Medical research organizations, pharmaceutical companies, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Effectiveness of communication in generating desirable behavior","Impact":"Ineffective implementation of preventive measures due to lack of compliance","Mitigation":"Improved crisis communication strategies and targeted behavioral interventions","Technologies":"Social media platforms, digital communication tools, behavior tracking systems","People":"General population, policymakers, public health authorities","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations, communication experts"}]}
